headline: What Does the 31% Share Price Drop Mean for UPS Investors in 2025?
summary: If you’ve found yourself staring at United Parcel Service’s stock chart trying to make sense of what comes next, you’re not alone. With shares closing at $87.22, the company’s performance over the past year has given investors plenty to talk about. After all, the price is down 29.6% since the start of the year and has shed 31.5% over the past twelve months, putting long-term holders on edge. While the stock eked out a 0.4% gain in the last week and is up 4.2% for the month, the longer-term...

headline: Is United Parcel Service Stock a Buy Now?
summary: UPS is resetting its business, but there's a risk that it could also reset its dividend.

headline: Trump-Xi Meeting, Fed Rate Decision, Apple Earnings: What to Watch This Week
summary: President Trump is due to meet this week with Chinese leader Xi Jinping, following constructive weekend trade talks between Washington and Beijing. Investors will also tune in this week into earnings from Apple, Amazon and Meta Platforms, plus the first Federal Reserve policy-setting meeting since the government shutdown began.
